Returns the status of a specified request. Use this step to check the status of asynchronous operations, e.g. the creation and deletion of alerts and actions upon them.

When using one of the aforementioned steps, the response contains a `requestId` field that you should provide here.

Returns the status of a specified request. Use this step to check the status of asynchronous operations (e.g. the creation or deletion of an incident).

When using one of the aforementioned steps, the response contains a `requestId` field that you should provide here.

stepsList.description: Returns the results of the provided analysis ID. The analysis ID can be found in the output of either the `Analyze File` step or the `Reanalyze Existing File` step.

stepsList.name: Get Domain Information

stepsList.name: Get File Report by Hash
stepsList.description: Returns information about the file with the given hash (either SHA-256, SHA-1, or MD5). You may use the `Get Analysis Results` step to obtain the file's hash values.

stepsList.name: Get IP Information
stepsList.description: Returns information about the given IP address.

stepsList.name: Get Upload URL for Large Files

stepsList.name: Get URL Analysis Report
stepsList.description: Returns the given URL address's analysis report.

stepsList.name: Reanalyze Existing File
stepsList.description: Rescans the given file. This step requires VirusTotal Premium. Free accounts might get a 403 Forbidden response.

stepsList.name: Scan URL

stepsList.name: Append to Array

stepsList.name: Rollup Numeric Array
stepsList.description: Performs a rollup function on an array of numbers.

Compare two arrays (left and right) to receive 3 sub-arrays:
- Intersection - objects that exist in both arrays.
- Left_dif - objects that exist only in the first array.
- Right_dif - objects that exist only in the second array.

MIN_VALUE and MAX_VALUE are limited to 32-bit integer, 
meaning MIN_VALUE can not be smaller than -2147483648
and MAX_VALUE can not be bigger than 2147483647.

stepsList.name: Update View
stepsList.description: Updates the view with the given view ID or external ID.

stepsList.name: Add User
stepsList.description: Adds a new user. If an account with the given email address already exists, the account will be updated with the data of the current request.

stepsList.name: Add Users
stepsList.description: Adds the given users to your LastPass account.

stepsList.name: Add User to Groups
stepsList.description: Adds the given user to the specified groups.

stepsList.name: Deactivate User
stepsList.description: Deactivates the specified user's account. The user will not be able to login, but their data and LastPass Business membership will be retained.

stepsList.name: Delete User
stepsList.description: Deletes the specified user's account entirely.

stepsList.name: Destroy User Sessions
stepsList.description: Destroys the given user's active login sessions.

stepsList.name: Force Master Password Change
stepsList.description: Requires a user to change their master password.

stepsList.name: Get User
stepsList.description: Returns information about the specified user.

stepsList.name: List Events
stepsList.description: Returns a list of events that have taken place in your LastPass account.

stepsList.name: List Shared Folders
stepsList.description: Returns a list of your shared folders and the permissions granted to them.

stepsList.name: List Users
stepsList.description: Returns a list of users in your LastPass account.

stepsList.name: Remove User from Groups
stepsList.description: Removes the given user from the specified groups.

stepsList.name: Send Password Reset Email
stepsList.description: Sends a password reset email to the specified user.

stepsList.name: Get KV-V1 Secret
stepsList.description: Returns the information of a given Key/Value Version 1 secret by name.

stepsList.name: Get KV-V2 Secret
stepsList.description: Returns the information of a given Key/Value Version 2 secret by name.

stepsList.name: Set KV-V1 Secret
stepsList.description:
Sets a Key/Value Version 1 secret in HashiCorp Vault.
If the secret name already exists, the current secret is updated. Otherwise, a new secret with the given name is created.

stepsList.name: Set KV-V2 Secret
stepsList.description:
Sets a Key/Value Version 1 secret in HashiCorp Vault, and returns information about the secret.
If the secret name already exists, the current secret is updated. Otherwise, a new secret with the given name is created.

stepsList.name: Generate App Rule Conditions
stepsList.description: A helper step to generate a JSON condition for application and append it to the rule's old conditions.

stepsList.name: Generate IDP Rule Conditions
stepsList.description: A helper step to generate a JSON condition for IDP and append it to the rule's existing conditions.

stepsList.name: Activate Configuration Changes
stepsList.description: Saves the configuration changes made by your workflow. You must use this step at the end of your workflow in order to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Add URLs to Blacklist
stepsList.description: Adds The provided URLs to the blacklist. Add the `Activate Configuration Changes` step at the end of your workflow to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Add URLs to Category
stepsList.description: Adds the provided URLs to the given category. Add the `Activate Configuration Changes` step at the end of your workflow to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Create IP Destination Group
stepsList.description: Creates a new IP destination group. At least one of `IP_DESTINATION_GROUP_IP_ADDRESSES`, `IP_DESTINATION_GROUP_COUNTRIES` and `IP_DESTINATION_GROUP_CATEGORIES` is required. Add the `Activate Configuration Changes` step at the end of your workflow to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Create Session
stepsList.description: Creates a session token to use in Zscaler Internet Access steps.

stepsList.name: Create URL Filtering Policy Rule
stepsList.description: Creates a URL filtering policy rule. Add the `Activate Configuration Changes` step at the end of your workflow to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Delete IP Destination Group
stepsList.description:
Deletes the IP destination group with the given ID.
Add the `Activate Configuration Changes` step at the end of your workflow to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Delete URL Filtering Policy Rule
stepsList.description:
Deletes the URL filtering policy rule with the given ID.
Add the `Activate Configuration Changes` step at the end of your workflow to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Edit Isolation Rule
stepsList.description:
Updates an existing isolation rule, specified by its `RULE_ID` and `RULE_NAME`. To get the list of all existing isolation rules, retrieve all rules using the `List URL Filtering Policy Rules` step and use the `Array Filter` step to get rules with an `ISOLATE` action.
Please note that the parameters you provide in this step will overwrite the rule's existing parameters. Therefore, existing parameters you wish to keep have to be included in this step.
Add the `Activate Configuration Changes` step at the end of your workflow to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Get IP Destination Group Details
stepsList.description: Returns information about the IP destination group with the given ID.

stepsList.name: Get URLs Category
stepsList.description: Returns the categories of the provided URLs.

stepsList.name: Get User Details by ID
stepsList.description: Returns details about the user with the given ID.

stepsList.name: List Blacklisted URLs
stepsList.description: Returns a list of your blacklisted URLs.

stepsList.name: List Categories
stepsList.description: Lists the URL categories in your account.

stepsList.name: List Departments
stepsList.description: Returns the list of departments that match the provided filters. If no filters are provided, returns the full list of departments.

stepsList.name: List Groups
stepsList.description: Returns the list of groups that match the provided filters. If no filters are provided, returns the full list of groups.

stepsList.name: List IP Destination Groups
stepsList.description: Returns the list of IP destination groups in your account.

stepsList.name: List Location Groups
stepsList.description: Returns the list of location groups that match the provided filters. If no filters are provided, returns the full list of location groups.

stepsList.name: List Locations
stepsList.description: Returns the list of locations that match the provided filters. If no filters are provided, returns the full list of locations.

stepsList.name: List URL Filtering Policy Rules
stepsList.description: Returns a list of all the URL filtering policy rules.

stepsList.name: List Users
stepsList.description: Returns a list of users that match the provided filters. If no filters are provided, returns the full list of users.

stepsList.name: Remove URLs from Blacklist
stepsList.description: Removes the provided URLs from the blacklist. Add the `Activate Configuration Changes` step at the end of your workflow to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Remove URLs from Category
stepsList.description: Removes the provided URLs from the provided category. Add the `Activate Configuration Changes` step at the end of your workflow to save the changes in Zscaler.

stepsList.name: Update URL Category
stepsList.description: Updates the category with the provided ID. Please note that using this step may result in changes in keywords and attributes. For more information, see the step's documentation link.

stepsList.name: Add Columns
stepsList.description:
Adds a new column to a given table.
The size of the data added must match the size of the table.
The ID count is zero-based, so the provided ID should be equal to the current number of columns.

stepsList.name: Add Rows
stepsList.description: Adds rows to a given table. Each row is represented by an array containing the values of each column.

stepsList.name: Add Worksheet
stepsList.description: Adds a new worksheet to the workbook. The worksheet will be added at the end of existing worksheets.

stepsList.name: Create Table
stepsList.description: Turns a range of cells in a given worksheet into a table object.

stepsList.name: Delete Column
stepsList.description: Deletes a column in a given table by ID.

stepsList.name: Delete Table
stepsList.description: Deletes a given table.

stepsList.name: Delete Worksheet
stepsList.description: Deletes a specified worksheet from your workbook.

stepsList.name: Get All Columns
stepsList.description: Returns a list of all columns of a given table.

stepsList.name: Get All Rows
stepsList.description: Returns a list of all rows of a given table.

stepsList.name: Get All Users
stepsList.description: Gets a list of all users.

stepsList.name: Get Cell Range
stepsList.description: Returns the contents of the given cell range.

stepsList.name: Get Column
stepsList.description: Gets a column in a given table by ID.

stepsList.name: Get Table
stepsList.description: Gets information about a given table.

stepsList.name: Get Worksheet
stepsList.description: Gets general information about a given worksheet: ID, name, position and visibility. To get more data about the worksheet, use the 'Get Worksheet Used Range Information' step.

stepsList.name: Get Worksheet Charts
stepsList.description: Gets a list of all charts in a given worksheet.

stepsList.name: Get Worksheet Data
stepsList.description: Returns the data of the given worksheet in JSON form. The step will only work on worksheets that contain a single table.

stepsList.name: Get Worksheet Tables
stepsList.description: Gets a list of all tables in a given worksheet.

stepsList.name: Get Worksheet Used Range Information
stepsList.description:
Gets detailed information about the used range of a given worksheet.
The used range is the smallest range that encompasses any cells that have a value or formatting assigned to them. If the worksheet is blank, this function will return the top left cell.

stepsList.name: List Workbook Tables
stepsList.description: Get the list of tables for a given workbook.

stepsList.name: List Workbook Worksheets
stepsList.description: Get the list of worksheets for a given workbook.

stepsList.name: Search Users by Name
stepsList.description: Searches for users by name.

stepsList.name: Update Row
stepsList.description: Updates the contents of the specified row in the given Excel table.

stepsList.name: Update Table
stepsList.description: Updates a given table using optional parameters: name, style, showHeaders and showTotals.

stepsList.name: Update Worksheet
stepsList.description: Updates a worksheet's name, position or visibility.

stepsList.name: Create Isolation Rule
stepsList.description: Creates a new isolation rule.

stepsList.name: Create Session
stepsList.description: Create a session token to use in other Cybereason steps.

stepsList.name: Delete Isolation Rule
stepsList.description: Deletes the given isolation rule.

stepsList.name: List Isolation Rules
stepsList.description: Returns a list of all isolation rules.

stepsList.name: List Sensors
stepsList.description: Returns a filtered list of sensors. If no filters are used, the full list of sensors will be returned.

stepsList.name: Retrieve Sensor Actions
stepsList.description: Returns a list of all the current or queued actions on sensors.

stepsList.name: Run Query
stepsList.description: Runs investigation queries to search for specific indicators and behaviors throughout your environment.

stepsList.name: Update Isolation Rule
stepsList.description: Updates the given isolation rule.

stepsList.name: Upgrade Sensors
stepsList.description: Upgrades the specified sensors.

stepsList.name: Send email with SMTP
stepsList.description: Sends an email using SMTP protocol.

stepsList.name: Create API keys
stepsList.description: Generates Nessus API keys. API keys allow you to authenticate to the Nessus server without creating a new session.

stepsList.name: Create token
stepsList.description: Generates a Nessus session token.

stepsList.name: Get host details
stepsList.description: Returns details for the specified host ID. Host IDs can be obtained from the `Get scan details` step. `Get host details` only return scan results that are younger than 35 days. This step requires `SCAN OPERATOR` user permissions and `CAN VIEW` scan permissions.

stepsList.name: Get scan details
stepsList.description: Returns scan results for a specific scan. This step returns limited data if scan results are older than 35 days.

stepsList.name: List scans
stepsList.description: Returns a list of scans where you have at least `CAN VIEW` permissions.

stepsList.name: Get Activity Monitor
stepsList.description: Returns information about actions' and actors' activity logs in your organization.

stepsList.name: Get API Audit Log
stepsList.description: Returns the Adaptive Shield API request's audit log. The default time range is 7 days.

stepsList.name: Get Single Security Check
stepsList.description: Returns the security check with the provided security check ID, its current status, and details.

stepsList.name: Get Summary of Security Checks
stepsList.description: Returns a summarized status and a breakdown of the list of security checks.

stepsList.name: Get System Audit Log
stepsList.description: Returns a collection of system logs for all available integrations. The default time range is 7 days.

stepsList.name: Get User Audit Log
stepsList.description: Logs the system users' events in the platform. The default time range is 7 days.

stepsList.name: Get User Inventory
stepsList.description: Returns the User Inventory, which fuses user-related contextual information across apps monitored in your Adaptive Shield account.

stepsList.name: List Accounts
stepsList.description: Lists the accounts the user has access to.

stepsList.name: List Affected Entities of Security Check
stepsList.description: Returns a list of affected entities for non-global security checks. For example, in case of "Public Repositories", the affected list would be the names of public repositories found.

stepsList.name: List Alerts
stepsList.description: Returns a list of alerts raised due to configuration drifts or degraded checks.

stepsList.name: List Integrations
stepsList.description: Returns a list of existing integrations.

stepsList.name: List Security Checks
stepsList.description: Returns a list of security checks, including their current status and details.

stepsList.name: List Supported SaaS
stepsList.description: Returns the list of supported SaaS for the given account.

stepsList.name: List System Users
stepsList.description: Returns a list of Adaptive Shield system users.

stepsList.name: Get Group Site
stepsList.description:
Returns the information of a specified group's site.
To attain the site ID, take the first ID shown in the `id` section of the result. For example, for `"id": "torqio.sharepoint.com,97c94af0-c474-429a-70e3-d7ea11276105,90f94552-7016-2ea1-dd96-d8f0f8c51f28"`, the site ID would be `97c94af0-c474-429a-70e3-d7ea11276105`.

stepsList.name: Search Sites
stepsList.description:
Returns all sites that match the given search query. If no query is given, the full list of sites is returned.
To attain the site ID, take the first ID shown in the `id` section of the result. For example, for `"id": "torqio.sharepoint.com,97c94af0-c474-429a-70e3-d7ea11276105,90f94552-7016-2ea1-dd96-d8f0f8c51f28"`, the site ID would be `97c94af0-c474-429a-70e3-d7ea11276105`.

stepsList.name: Add Comment to Lead

stepsList.name: Add Comment to Story
stepsList.description: Add a comment to the provided story.

stepsList.description: Updates the user to whom the provided lead is assigned.

stepsList.name: Assign a Story
stepsList.description: Updates the user to whom the provided story is assigned.

stepsList.name: Create Session
stepsList.description: Creates an API token.

stepsList.name: Get Lead Entities
stepsList.description: Returns the list of the lead's entities.

stepsList.name: Get Leads
stepsList.description: Returns a list of leads. Filtering and pagination are supported by the step's optional parameters.

stepsList.name: Get Stories
stepsList.description: Returns a list of stories. Filtering and pagination are supported by the step's optional parameters.

stepsList.name: Refresh Token
stepsList.description: Refreshes the session using a refresh token from the `Create Session` step.

stepsList.name: Update Lead Status
stepsList.description: Updates the status for the provided lead.

stepsList.name: Update Story Status
stepsList.description: Updates the status for the provided story.

stepsList.name: Create Webhook Trigger
stepsList.description: Creates a webhook trigger. When you create a webhook for a particular event, the notification data will be sent to a URL of your choosing each time it is triggered.

stepsList.name: Get Action Details
stepsList.description: Returns the details of the action with the specified ID.

stepsList.name: Get Message Details
stepsList.description: Returns the details of the message with the specified ID.

stepsList.name: List Messages for Room
stepsList.description: Returns all messages in the specified room.

stepsList.name: List Rooms
stepsList.description: Returns the rooms to which the authenticated user belongs.

stepsList.name: List Users
stepsList.description: Returns a list of the users in your organization. If you are not an admin, you can retrieve only one user by using the `EMAIL_ADDRESS` or the `USER_ID` parameter.

stepsList.name: Send Message
stepsList.description:
Sends a message with the attached action. Please specify one of the following parameters:
- `ROOM_ID` - when replying in a specific room
- `EMAIL_ADDRESS` - when replying to a specific user by email address
- `USER_ID` - when replying to a specific user by user ID
- `PARENT_MESSAGE_ID` - when replying to a specific message
If markdown is specified, `PLAIN_TEXT_MESSAGE` may be used to provide alternate text for UI clients that do not support rich text.

stepsList.name: Send Message With Actions
stepsList.description:
Sends a message with the attached action. Please specify one of the following parameters:
- `ROOM_ID` - when replying in a specific room
- `EMAIL_ADDRESS` - when replying to a specific user by email address
- `USER_ID` - when replying to a specific user by user ID
- `PARENT_MESSAGE_ID` - when replying to a specific message
If markdown is specified, `PLAIN_TEXT_MESSAGE` may be used to provide alternate text for UI clients that do not support rich text.

stepsList.name: Send Message With File
stepsList.description:
Sends a message with the attached action. Please specify one of the following parameters:
- `ROOM_ID` - when replying in a specific room
- `EMAIL_ADDRESS` - when replying to a specific user by email address
- `USER_ID` - when replying to a specific user by user ID
- `PARENT_MESSAGE_ID` - when replying to a specific message
If markdown is specified, `PLAIN_TEXT_MESSAGE` may be used to provide alternate text for UI clients that do not support rich text.

stepsList.name: Assign Filtered Assets to Tag Value
stepsList.description: Adds or removes tags to or from the provided assets.

stepsList.name: Create Dynamic Tag with Tag Value for Unassessed Assets
stepsList.description: Creates a tag and a tag value for assets that were not previously assessed.

stepsList.name: Create Scan
stepsList.description: Creates a scan configuration that can later be used to launch a scan. Use the `List Scan Templates` step to get the relevant scan template's UUID. This step requires `SCAN OPERATOR` user permissions.

stepsList.name: Create Static Tag Value for Discovered Assets
stepsList.description: Creates a tag value. The tag category can be specified by UUID or name. If the provided category name is not found, a new category with the provided name is created. To get the available categories' names and UUIDs, use the `List Tag Categories` step.

stepsList.name: Download Exported Scan
stepsList.description: Downloads an exported scan, according to the provided scan ID and file ID. Use the `Export Scan` step to get the file ID.

stepsList.name: Export Scan
stepsList.description: Exports a scan, according to the provided scan ID. After executing this step, use the `Get Export Status` step to check the export's status. Once "ready" is returned as the export status, you can use the `Download Exported Scan` to download the scan.

stepsList.name: Get Asset Details
stepsList.description: Returns information about the provided asset. To get the list of asset UUIDs, use the `List Assets` step.

stepsList.name: Get Export Status
stepsList.description: Checks the status of the exported scan. Once "ready" is returned, you can use the `Download Exported Scan` to download the scan.

stepsList.name: Get Latest Scan Status
stepsList.description: Gets the latest status for the provided scan ID.

stepsList.name: Get Scan Details
stepsList.description: Returns scan results for a specific scan.

stepsList.name: Get Scan Details for Specific Host
stepsList.description: Returns details of the provided run, specified by HISTORY_ID, for the specified scan and host.

stepsList.name: Get Scan History
stepsList.description: Returns a list of objects, each of which represent an individual run of the specified scan.

stepsList.name: Get Tag Value Details
stepsList.description: Returns information about the specified tag value. To get the available tag values' UUIDs, use the `List Tag Values` step.

stepsList.name: Launch Scan
stepsList.description: Launches a scan, according to the provided scan ID.

stepsList.name: List Assets
stepsList.description: Returns information about up to 5,000 assets. For more information about asset filtering, see `https://developer.tenable.com/docs/workbench-filters`.

stepsList.name: List Folders
stepsList.description: Lists all the folders that are visible to the user - both Tenable-provided folders and the user's custom folders.

stepsList.name: List Scanners
stepsList.description: Gets the list of available scanners. This step requires `SCAN MANAGER` user permissions.

stepsList.name: List Scans
stepsList.description: Returns a list of scans where you have at least `CAN VIEW` permissions.

stepsList.name: List Scan Templates
stepsList.description: Lists Tenable-provided scan templates. Use the UUIDs from this step's output in the `Create Scan` step.

stepsList.name: List Tag Categories
stepsList.description: Returns a list of tag categories.

stepsList.name: List Tags for An Asset
stepsList.description: Lists the assigned tags for an asset, specified by asset UUID. To get the available assets' UUIDs, use the `List Assets` step.

stepsList.name: List Tag Values
stepsList.description: Lists all tag values that match the provided filters, if provided. If no filters are provided, all tag values are returned.

stepsList.name: Update Scan
stepsList.description: Updates a scan configuration. This step requires `SCAN OPERATOR` user permissions and `CAN CONFIGURE` scan permissions.

stepsList.name: Set Profile
stepsList.description:
After uploading a sample with the "interactive" field set as true, when the sample reaches static_analysis status, a profile should be selected in order to continue.
This step allows you to select a profile to do so.

stepsList.description: This step allows you to update the profile with the specified ID or name.
